title: Changes To NFL Playoffs
description:
Israel Gutierrez, David Jacoby and FTW's Charles McDonald debate their reaction to the NFL changing their playoff overtime rules and what it tells them that the Grizzlies just keep winning even without Ja Morant.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
